name: CSSearchParameterUse
title: CapabilityStatement Search Parameter Use
publisher: Health Level Seven, Inc. - [WG Name] WG
description: This extension defines if a search parameter is only allowed in certain contexts

element.short: Search context a search parameter allowed to be used
element.definition: This extension defines if a search parameter is only allowed in certain contexts: standalone, _include, or _revInclude, by setting each one to either true or false.
element.comment: For example, A search parameter has allow-standalone=false, allow-include=true and allow-revinclude=true. This means server does not support using such search parameter in a standalone search but client can use this parameter in _include and _revInclude searches.

element.definition: May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element. element.comment: There can be no stigma associated with the use of extensions by any application, project, or standard - regardless of the institution or jurisdiction that uses or defines the extensions.
